label: Learning Pali
desc: I’m currently learning Pali, the ancient written language of the Theravada Buddhist texts

label: First Veggie Garden
desc: I’m working on my first ever vegetable garden! I’m planting pumpkin, radish, beet, and okra, among others.

label: Practicing French
desc: I majored in French Language & Literature in college, and the French language is still one of my favorites!

label: Crochet & Embroidery
desc: I have been crocheting since I was 8 years old. You’d think I’d be better at it… I’m also learning how to embroider!

label: Pastel & Charcoal Drawing
desc: Charcoal and pastel are my favorite physical media to work with!

label: Yoga & Meditation
desc: I am certified to teach Restorative Yoga! I practice yoga, meditation, and mindfulness daily.
